description: HTML template for a TodoMVC application using Riot.js framework, including embedded scripts for managing todos, filtering, and editing.

methods.name: saveTodos
methods.description: Saves the current list of todos using external storage.

methods.name: filteredTodos
methods.description: Returns filtered list of todos based on active filter.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item when Enter key is pressed.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggles completion status for all todos.
